value.title: Robust artificial intelligence tools to predict future cancer
value.excerpt: MIT researchers have improved their machine learning system, Mirai, developed to predict cancer risk from mammogram images, and validated their effectiveness with studies across several hospitals.

value.title: Google’s updated Voice Access leverages AI to detect in-app icons
value.excerpt: Google says it's leveraging AI to detect in-app icons, toward the goal of making Android apps more accessible.

value.title: Facial recognition now used for border screenings at MSP Airport
value.excerpt: St. Paul International Airport from other countries can now choose to go through border control using facial recognition scanners. U.S. Customs and Border Protection announced on Wednesday that "Simplified Arrival" is now available at both MSP Airport terminals for international arrivals.

value.title: Digital Careers Ahead: Why Should Techies Have All The Fun With Artificial Intelligence?
value.excerpt: Every organization wants to build their future on digital technologies, but what does it take to make it all happen? To get a better sense of the skills and talents that will be in demand, I reached out to experts and entrepreneurs across the landscape to get their views on what it takes to build a career in this new world.

value.title: Scientists develop AI-powered ‘puff technology’ to help smokers quit
value.excerpt: The onboard computer for e-cigs is designed to help people quit by predicting when they'll next crave a nicotine hit.

value.title: Baidu gets California nod for testing driverless vehicles on Sunnyvale streets
value.excerpt: Baidu is the sixth company to have a permit to test without a driver behind the wheel. The permit allows it to test three autonomous vehicles on specified streets within Sunnyvale.

value.title: New Global Rackspace Technology Study Uncovers Widespread Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Knowledge Gap

value.title: Microsoft’ PlayFab grows ninefold in 3 years
value.excerpt: Microsoft's PlayFab division said today that its monthly active users grew nearly nine times since the software giant acquired it.

value.title: Carlyle Invests in AI Startup After Year as Client
